titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to clarify Federal authority relating to land acquisition from willing sellers for the North Country National Scenic Trail.
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to clarify Federal authority relating to land acquisition from willing sellers for the North Country National Scenic Trail.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Amends the National Trails System Act to prohibit federal acquisition of lands outside the exterior boundaries of any federally administered area for the North Country National Scenic Trail except with the owner's consent.
